column1: Funeral services  are scheduled for 2 p.m. Monday
column3: 2015 at First Baptist Church Frankston with Rev. Scott Wiley
column4: Rev. Olin Boles and Rev. J.A. Griffin officiating.  Interment will follow at Frankston City Cemetery under the direction of Autry Funeral Home.   Visitation will begin on Sunday
column6: 2015 with family receiving friends from 6-8 p.m. at Autry Funeral Home in Frankston.   service - 2 pm Monday 6/15/15 at First Baptist - Frankston  Visitation - 6-8 pm Sunday 6/14/15 Autry Funeral Home Chapel Frankston
